Reviews.Title: “good location,nice rooms, bad attitude!!”
Reviews.Author: Offy_b
Reviews.Content: We needed a place for one night and we found this hostel (a day before we needed) who looked very nice and was in a very nice location. first when we came the guy in the Reception said he has no rooms (we were 2 girls, dressed fine-not something to be scared of) then he said he have only room for 3 and gave us a high price, we said thanks but no thanks. the next day we came again and someone else told us we could get a room for 2 and gave us better prices he said he had one last room with private bathroom (2 min later he told other tourist just that) and 1 room with shared ones. we asked for the one with the private bathrooms. we were happy we found a good location for ok price, we needed to climb 4 Floors (no elevator) and got a room with no purch but we didnt mind. we went out and came back at night when we found we had COLD WATER!! and no hot water for more then 30 sec. when we came down they were 2 guys, one from the last night (who told us there is no room and gave us a high price) and he started yelling at us!! and laughed that we are spoiiled!! we told him that we payed for a room with a private bathroom and he talked sarcasm and told us there is nothing wrong with using shared bathroom (f.y.i - the whole trip till that day we stayed in a shared bathroom apartment and we wanted for our last night to have owr own- and we payed more for that) luckly for us there was another guy who was much more reasonable and after we got louder (before he said there is nothing to do) he offerd to go up with me and check it. we went there and at first he tried to say there is hot water I told him to wait and after few more sec. he agreed with me and said there is not much hot water (they were none). he said there is nothing to do now and hell tell the manager at morning. at morning we went to the manager and told him we want to pay for a room with shared bathroom cuz thats what we got, and he told us there is no way there are not hot water and he will check it now.. and that the guy from last night told him that they were hot but not a lot. I will short my story now but I will tell you there were a lot of Lies, attempts to find excuses, attempts to trick us and only after 15 min of talking loud and getting angry he gave us some of the money back (and we payed for a room with shared bathroom). oh and it's VERY loud at morning!!! ** SO BE CARFUL FROM THIS PLACE - GOOD LOCATION , BAD ATTITUDE, NOISY!! ** p.s - when I got out of the cold water shower we found out there is no Heating ןin the rooms - this option is blocked in A.C remote!!

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Shar1906
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hotel Paris for four nights during June. We hadn't booked anywhere to stay in Barcelona we just turned up. Hotel Paris was the cheapest Hotel/Hostel we could find and it was in a very good area, on Les Rambles The service was very good when we got there and the receptionist was very helpful. The room was basic but nice. very clean and comfortable. The hostel was near everything and we walked right into the hustle and bustle of Barcelona and its nightlife. You couldn't hear the nightlife from our room. The only thing i would have to say is that you could hear people coming in from there nights out every so often, but it was hardly noticeable. Definitely good value for money and worth staying at.

Reviews.Title: “Great location. Not great staff.”
Reviews.Author: enc429
Reviews.Content: It's right in the heart of Las Ramblas and right next to the subway and across the way from La Boqueria, so getting places was EXTREMELY convenient. The rooms were adequate, equipped w/ AC, decent beds, clean bathroom and a TV. The lobby had lockers, so you could check your bag while the room is being prepared, and go site see. The negatives were: at the time the lobby getting painted, so the paint fumes were annoying. The guy working the front desk was not friendly at all and no elevator, which normally wouldn't be so bad but these were unusually steep, narrow stairs and we were on the 4th floor, I think, or maybe 3rd...anyway, after a night of drinks, going up and down the stairs sucks...but overall, a decent price in relation to the great location.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and very cheerful”
Reviews.Author: DoveIpswich
Reviews.Content: Hostal Paris is in a brilliant location just off La Ramblas, close to the metro and the Place de Reial & Catalunya. Its currently being renovated and when we stayed there the workmen didn't start work until 10am which gave us the chance of a lie in . If your on a low budget its a good place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “good location if at night a bit on the noisy side”
Reviews.Author: nornimay
Reviews.Content: we were grateful to the staff for finding us a roomto stay after arriving to find the hotel we had booked into had over booked it took us 3 hours and 1 bus ride and 2 metro journeys to find a hotel with a spare room the staff were kind and helpful to us we found the room clean ,maybe dated and a bit noisy at night but a great location and we had agreat 6 days many thanks

Reviews.Title: “A distaster”
Reviews.Author: TravellerinBxl
Reviews.Content: Together with 2 other friends we booked a three-bed room for 5 nights. We were slightly chocked already when we entered the room - it had no windows! It was a humid warm burrow with a false "window" to some kind of an internal well. But ok, we came to visit Barcelona, not to sit in the hotel room, so we did not spend too much time thinking about that. During the night we couldn't sleep, it was too warm (not working air-co) and too loud (you can here people talking in the corridor, slamming doors, etc), but the worst we were scratching most of the time. I thought (oh, how naive one can be) it's nervous itching, some kind of psychological reaction to the first night in not known place. Unfortunately, in the morning we discovered bugs on our sheets! We identified them as bed-bugs (brrrr), later we've learnt there were also fleas. We packed our staff immediately to change the hotel. But at the reception desk another nasty surprise - we booked the hotel via barcelona30 website and pre-paied by a credit card a certain percentage of the total price which gave almost 90 Euros. When you book the hotel, it is suggested you pre-pay a part of the accomodation price. U-huh, as we've learnt aaalllll 90 Euros was the fee for the booking service! and we still needed to pay extra 80 Euros for the spent night there. I'm still to write a formal complaint to the barcelona30 company, and I will not hesitate to take legal steps, as it's simple cheating. All together an awful adventure. And as for the bugs, we were so badly bitten, that we needed a dermatological assistance - we are still taking anti-alergic pills and apply a special ointment. I wish I have taken photos of red spots on my feet and swallowed wrists so I could send them to the hotel. Higly not-recommended place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for the price, very cute hotel and great service”
Reviews.Author: Pagazaurtundua
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on a short holiday and found the room not too big but nice. This is what we paid for, no complaints. The bathrooms were new and lovely and the bed was great. We ate at the restaurant they have at the hotel: the food was top quality and the price was right. The hotel is excellently located just downtown Barcelona, near great dining places and tourist attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty, old and horrible hostal with mean and unfriendly people at the reception”
Reviews.Author: CascaisLuvTravelling
Reviews.Content: II booked the room at Hostal Paris through the website [--] for one week (7 nights) where they charge you 87€ straight away and tell you that each night comes out to 59€ . The price seemed reasonable and after reading reviews about the hostal it seemed quite nice. But it was absolutely awful. It is extremely old and very ugly. The rooms are dirty, the bed sheets very used and the towels have holes. The soap in the bathroom belonged to another hotel. The bed had bugs and and me and my friend were bitten while trying to sleep during the 1st and only night (as we booked another hotel just 20€ more and on the Ramblas with breakfast and a fantastic room with a wonderful view and soundproof windows). The noise you can hear in the Hostal Paris is the same as if you were outside, or the people talking, screaming, laughing and cars, ambulances were inside your room making a huge noise until the morning. The 2 people at the reception of the hostal do not know how to smile (nor even understand any other language beside Spanish) The night receptionist told us when we said we were leaving the next day that we did not have to pay anything more as we had already paid 87€. The next morning when we checked out, the lady at the reception screamed at us saying that we had to pay an extra 53,50€ (after already having paid 87€) for one night. Said that the 87€ was barcelona30 commission, but that’s not what barcelona30 said before, never had they said that the room was 53€50 per night (they said 59€) it was a horrible 1st night in Barcelona (a fantastic city that we were visiting for the 1st time). It is a dreadful hostal, horrible rooms, very unfriendly and badly educated people who work there. I do not recommend this hostel to anyone. Absolutely the worst thing with mean uneducated screaming people working there, that I’ve ever encountered in my life.

Reviews.Title: “Not Bed”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Its a cheap Hostal with great location for those who want to be in Barcelona`s heart (Ramblas and Plaza de la Catalunha). Good bathroom, not a bed room. The only problem its the noise from the other rooms. For those who just want a place to stay at night its very good.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: OK, the decor was nothing to write home about but the rooms were acceptably clean. However when you can look out of your bedroom window onto the Ramblas, nothing else matters. Despite this proximity, the heavy shutters kept out all light and noise until we were ready to get up and go out again.

Reviews.Title: “dirty old hotel”
Reviews.Author: funnygy
Reviews.Content: I stayed here and was very un impressed. the rooms were dirty and had bugs. i stayed there becouse of the location and the price. CHEEP , but here you got no bargin for your money it is up many flights of stairs hard if you have a lot of luggage ( i did not) the staff were ok but spoke little english. got some bedbug bites on my 2nd light there and moved to another budget hotel ( no steps ,had a tv and air and was 5 euros cheeper) my advice is keep looking if all are full settle for this cheep place. or spend 5 or 10 euro more and get a nice place

Reviews.Title: “Not bad if your alone”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: While travelling into spain on a hot muggy day this was the best/ cheapest hotel i could find a cheap hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very nice location!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Great location. fair price. Nothing realy special just a very good hotel. Nice view over the ramblas!
